personal.name: Abdulrasheed Ibrahim (Abdul)
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer
personal.bio: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable systems and writing high-quality code in Python, Javascript, Typescript, and C. Strong background in system design, performance optimization, and modern software practices like TDD and Agile. Active Contributor to the Python Programming Language (Cpython).

Contributing to development of CHATS, cNGN, StableRail, and Scrybit projects
Working with Python, Rust, Axum, Soroban, Firebase, C, AWS, Django, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Redis
Worked on Foundry's Agent Web Engine (AWE) for rendering static sites
Implemented LinkedIn and Salesforce integration using redis-based pooling system
Developed Foundry's PyPI package for developer integration
Technologies: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, AWS, GCP, Redis
Designed and led development of core services and backend architecture
Built supporting microservices and full cloud infrastructure using AWS CDK, Terraform, ECS
Implemented comprehensive network setup including VPCs, load balancing, route tables
